Related repos

  • End-to-end autonomous driving with vision-language-action models
  • Dataset and model for robot manipulation
  • RoboBrain 2.0: open-source model for robotic reasoning, planning, spatial and temporal perception, and scene understanding
  • Open-source agent system for planning and producing videos
  • Framework for building autonomous agents
  • Taskade MCP—server and codegen for building AI agent tools from OpenAPI APIs, connect agents to external platforms like Claude and Cursor

  • Open-source driving simulator for AI research
  • Open-source framework for building and running AI agents, connects to tools and APIs, no invite code needed
